doc:
Heather Halley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heather_Halley 0 Heather Halley is an American film, television and stage actress, television news anchor, and voice actress. She is perhaps best known as the English voice of Para-Medic in the Metal Gear series and was an announcer for several awards ceremonies, including the 59th Grammy Awards, the 4th and 5th Spike Video Game Awards, and the 10th Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards. Halley has also worked on voice work and played the uncredited voice of Angie Salter in fifth episode of the web series Terminator Salvation: The Machinima Series. Heather_Halley is an_American_film_,_television_and_stage_actress , television_news_anchor , and voice_actress . She is_perhaps_best_known as the_English_voice of Para-Medic in the_Metal_Gear_series and was an_announcer for several_awards_ceremonies , including the_59th_Grammy_Awards , the_4th_and_5th_Spike_Video_Game_Awards , and the_10th_Nickelodeon_Kids '_Choice_Awards . Halley has_also_worked on voice_work and played the_uncredited_voice of Angie_Salter in fifth_episode of the_web_series_Terminator_Salvation : The_Machinima_Series .
